name: Terminal Velocity (itch) (007Whiterussian)
description:
Reach Your Terminal Velocity!

Pilot your Engram to build up speed. Charging up EDM City to keep the party going!

Two Unique Game Modes

Start your run in Classic Mode to slowly ease into the game's advanced mechanics as your speed increases, or tackle a greater challenge in Endless Mode to test your mastery of the game. 

Top the Leaderboard as you compete with players from around the world!

View the global standings in the leaderboard menu, as well as where you place in relation to other players, and how you have improved over time.

Development Details

This game was developed by a group of college students from Chapman University during the 2021-2022 school year, below are our names and roles. 

Development TeamRoleMichael EfseaffTeam Lead and ArtistMark GriffinMusic LeadLuke Driscoll UI Designer Alex ValloneProgramming LeadLogan WelshDatabase Engineer
